articles.title: Alex Trebek's widow, Jean, shares a photo from the couple's wedding day in 1990 thanking fans - Daily Mail
articles.description: Alex Trebek's widow, Jean, has shared a picture from the couple's wedding day in 1990. The photo shows him sliding a wedding ring onto his wife's finger. The pair had been married for 30 years.
articles.content:
The widow of Jeopardy! host Alex Trebek has shared a photo from the couple's wedding 30 years ago.
